title: AT&T Mobility CEO Lurie says he’s not concerned about Apple’s iPhone financing program
text: AT&T Mobility CEO Glenn Lurie said his company is unconcerned about Apple offering a competing phone financing program to iPhone buyers. Lurie made the comment at the Code Mobile conference in Half Moon Bay, California. Apple launched its iPhone Upgrade Program around the time the new iPhone 6s were launched. After signing a two-year financing agreement, customers get […] »
